summary:
This is my first standalone armor for Skyrim
No replacer. Unique armor. Male and Female version.
In Version 5.2 now also light leather armor and fixed problems_i hope
descriptionHtml:
=======================================================================================
              Update____ Read this for Barbarian Armor Standalone version 5.02 
=======================================================================================
Update______________04.02.2012

Reaplouded.  fixed some mistakes by packing the mod.

When you install the mod you have to check by diferent smits in diferent towns 
to forge items or to buy jewelry.

If dont show at once you wait or sleap about 48 hours of the game time.

1.New Female and Male Armor

Male and Feamle Barbarian Leather armor___light
================================================================================
__Barbarian Leather Armor____For the players that dont like to run half naked

Just install over previous version.

What this mod does:
===========================================================
Import the *****Barbarian Armor*****
Light and Heavy version

Installation Instructions:

1.Install with mod manager
===================================

2.Manual Installation:
==================================

3.Download Barbarian Armor Standalone 5.02
====================================================================================
4. go to **(your user name)**\\Documents and Settings\\My Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim

open the SkyrimPrefs.ini with the notepad
and put this line under the [Launcher] section

bEnableFileSelection=1

3.Unpack the mod to a known location like (Desktop).
===========================================================
3.Find the folder labeled \'Data\' within the mods files.

Copy data folder to your Skyrim main folder where the TESV.exe is

When prompted by Windows if you would like to overwrite files with the same name
in the data folder located there answer, \"Yes To All\".

4.Start up Skyrim , 
======================
and place a checkmark next to 
BarbarianArmor.esp and Barbarian Jewelry.esp 
in your Data files in your Skyrim Launcher.
It is the small window that open when you start Skyrim.

5. What You get:
=================

01.Barbarian Armor___(Male and female Version)__Hide section to forge
02.Barbarian Leather Armor__(Male and female Version)__Hide section to forge__**New in 5.0**
03.Barbarian Gauntlets___(Male and female Version)__Hide section to forge
04.Barbarian Boots___(Male and female Version)__Hide section to forge
05.Barbarian Helmet___(Male and female Version)__Hide section to forge
06.Barbarian Ring
07.Barbarian Amulet
08.Barbarian Light Diadem

09.Barbarian Heavy Armor___(Male and female Version)__Steel section to forge
10.Barbarian Heavy Gauntlets___(Male and female Version)__Steel section to forge
11.Barbarian Heavy Boots___(Male and female Version)__Steel section to forge
12.Barbarian Heavy Helmet___(Male and female Version)__Steel section to forge
13.Barbarian Heavy Diadem

6.Visit a smith and forge 
================================
1.light Armor under the Hide section 
2.and Heavy Armor under Steel section
============================================================== 
Or if you have some amount of money 
you can buy the stuff at next smithy merchants

- Riverwood
- Whiterun
- Makarath
- Solitude
- Windhelm
- Falkreath

7.Un-Installation Instructions
===================================

Remove the checkmark from BarbarianArmor.esp and Barbarian Jewelry.esp
 in the data files at start of the Skyrim launcher

If you would also like to remove the files

delate the folder Barbarian from the data\\meshes\\armor
and the folder Barbarian from the data\\textures\\armor
and the file BarbarianArmor.esp and Barbarian Jewelry.esp from the data folder

=======================================================================================
=======================================================================================
_____________________________OLD VERSIONS_____________________________________________
=======================================================================================
=======================================================================================
              Update____ Read this for Barbarian Armor Standalone version 3.0
=======================================================================================
Update______________13.01.2012

1.New Female armor.
2.Barbarian Diadem is now unenchanted

Just install over previous version.

First of all:

1.If you use my the Replacer Barbarian,
========================================
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1090

you install this standalone version after the replacer,
if not skip to chapter 2.


What this mod does:
===========================================================
Import the ****New Armor***____ *****Barbarian Armor*****
Installation Instructions:

Download the file:

2.Barbarian Armor Standalone 2.0
====================================================================================
1. go to **(your user name)**\\Documents and Settings\\My Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim

open the SkyrimPrefs.ini with the notepad
and put this line under the [Launcher] section

bEnableFileSelection=1

3.Unpack the mod to a known location like (Desktop).
===========================================================
3.Find the folder labeled \'Data\' within the mods files.

Copy data folder to your Skyrim main folder where the TESV.exe is

When prompted by Windows if you would like to overwrite files with the same name
in the data folder located there answer, \"Yes To All\".

5.Start up Skyrim , 
======================
and place a checkmark next to 
BarbarianArmor.esp in your Data files in your Skyrim Launcher.
It is the small window that open when you start Skyrim.

6. What You get:
=================

1.Barbarian Armor___(Male and female Version)
2.Barbarian Gauntlets___(Male and female Version)
3.Barbarian Boots___(Male and female Version)
4.Barbarian Helmet___(Male and female Version)
5.Barbarian Ring
6.Barbarian Fire and Ice Necklace


7.Visit a smith and forge Armor under the Hide section
============================================================== 
Or if you have some amount of money 
you can buy the stuff at next smithy merchants

- Riverwood
- Whiterun
- Makarath
- Solitude
- Windhelm
- Falkreath

8.Un-Installation Instructions
===================================

Remove the checkmark from BarbarianArmor.esp in the
data files at start of the Skyrim launcher

If you would also like to remove the files

delate the folder Barbarian from the data\\meshes\\armor
and the folder Barbarian from the data\\textures\\armor
and the file BarbarianArmor.esp from the data folder
====================================================================================
====================================================================================
====================================================================================
====================================================================================
9. Credits:
==============
******Bethesda For Skyrim.
=================================================================================
******rubedo4225********* i use his textures from: ******The Saviors Hide*****
to make a female version of the Barbarian armor
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1028
==================================================================================
*****doodaboom****** i use his textures from the mod ********Scout Armor******** 
For the Barbarian Leather Armor
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7109
===================================================================================
****Yuril****** I use his textures from the mod ******Better Circlets HQ V1o1*****
For The Barbarian Diadem
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6495
===================================================================================


10. Permison 
from ******rubedo4225*********
================================

----------
 Author notes
 -------------
 Don\'t really mind if you take this and do anything with it,

 File credits
----------------

And for providing the original Savior\'s Hide, obviously.
he photo service that sold me \"wolf_texture.jpg\" for fifty cents.
=========================================================================

author: Cokla
